skill.name: Deadly Reach
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Project lines of pure force over a short distance for 150% weapon damage as Physical.

Every third hit has a 50% chance to knock enemies up into the air.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Strike multiple enemies in a row with each attack. Every third hit has a chance to knock enemies up into the air.

rune.name: Foresight
rune.description: Every third hit also increases the damage of all your attacks by 15% for 5 seconds.
rune.simpleDescription: Every third hit also increases the damage of all your attacks.

skill.name: Lashing Tail Kick
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick that deals 755% weapon damage as Physical.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick that is effective against small groups of enemies.

rune.name: Sweeping Armada
rune.description: Unleash a large roundhouse kick that deals 825% weapon damage as Physical to enemies within 15 yards.
rune.simpleDescription: Unleash a large roundhouse kick that is effective against a large group of enemies.

skill.name: Sweeping Wind
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex that continuously deals 105% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. The vortex lasts 6 seconds and is refreshed each time you strike an enemy with a melee attack. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to increase the vortex effect up to 3 stacks for a total of 315% weapon damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex for 6 seconds that damages nearby enemies. Critical Hits intensify the vortex.

rune.name: Master of Wind
rune.description:
While your vortex is at 3 or more stacks, enemies damaged by Sweeping Wind for 3 consecutive seconds are Frozen for 2 seconds.

Enemies cannot be frozen by Sweeping Wind more than once every 3 seconds.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
While the vortex is at 3 or more stacks, enemies continuously damaged by Sweeping Wind are Frozen.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Blinding Speed
rune.description:
Gain 40% increased chance to Dodge for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased chance to Dodge after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Desert Shroud
rune.description: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken by 50%.
rune.simpleDescription: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken.

skill.name: Mantra of Salvation
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain an additional 20% increased resistance to all elements for 3 seconds.

Passive: You and your allies within 60 yards gain 20% increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain greatly increased resistance to all elements.

Passive: You and nearby allies gain increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Agility
rune.description: Passive: Mantra of Salvation also increases Dodge Chance by 35%.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Mantra of Salvation also increases Dodge Chance.

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

skill.name: Sixth Sense
skill.description: Reduce all non-Physical damage taken by 25%.
skill.flavor: The final test of the Serpent's Form takes place in "The Pit of 12 Vipers." The initiates are not told about the 13th.

skill.name: The Guardian's Path
skill.description: While dual-wielding, you gain a 35% chance to dodge incoming attacks. While using a two-handed weapon, all Spirit generation is increased by 15%.
skill.flavor: "No weapon can overcome the weakness of an undisciplined mind. They can only serve as an extension of the self." —Waykeeper Tzo Krin

skill.name: Seize the Initiative
skill.description: Dealing damage to enemies above 75% Life increases your attack speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water — flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

skill.name: Intervene
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Taunt enemies within 10 yards of you for 3 seconds when you are hit.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Taunt enemies near you when you are hit.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.

skill.name: Poison Bolts
skill.description:
Cooldown: 3 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 320% weapon damage and an additional 100% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 3 seconds

Shoots a deadly poisoned bolt.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stun enemies.

skill.name: Anatomy
skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1.8% for you and the Scoundrel.
skill.simpleDescription: Increases Critical Hit Chance for you and the Scoundrel.
